attributes.action: Why not make the lorry/van/car manufactors introduce an engine to replace the diesel engine which has been well over due !!
attributes.additional_details: Why cant the worlds goverments make the manufactors of the Diesel engine to stop making diesel vehicles and introduce a replacement engine for lorrys/buses/vans/ tractors and cars as its so very over due now,just think no smelly soot coming out of the back of those exhuast pipes, think its time to move on as like the trains.
